boardgame.name: Fluch der Mumie
Gangsi
Piramida
Pyramid
Pyramid of Pengqueen
キョンシー 日本語版
古墓企鵝
古墓迷蹤
boardgame.description: Fluch der Mumie (Curse of the Mummy) is a game with asymmetrical goals. While one player as the Mummy tries to catch tomb raiders, the other players try to secure as many treasures as possible from the Pyramid._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game is played with magnetic playing pieces on two sides of a vertical board, so the Mummy player cannot see the pieces of the tomb raiders. As the Mummy piece consists of two parts (one on each side of the board) the tomb raiders on the other hand know the movements of the Mummy._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;They move their pieces via dice rolls and judging by the color of the tomb raiders treasure goal cards and their dice rolls, the Mummy player tries to deduce their position on the board, while they try to evade him._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;When the Mummy moves over a tomb raider, he is _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;caught_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; by the Mummy magnet, thrown into the dungeon and loses some life points. The mummy wins when it earns a certain number of life points, while the tomb raiders have to secure a certain amount of treasures. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Ravensburger states that bluffing and memory also play a big part in this game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Contents: 1 magnetic game board, 1 magnetic mummy figure (2 pieces), 4 magnetic treasure hunters (tomb raiders), 12 life points, 5 treasure hunter dice, 1 Mummy die, 23 mission cards, 2 cover tiles._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Ravenburger - Pyramid Language: Dutch, English, French, German, Italian _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Spanish Players: 2 to 5 Age: 8+ Duration: 30 tot 45 min Weight: 0.880 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: In de depths of the pyramid, corageous adventurers search for hidden treasures. But the mummy dwells in the same areas, trying to scare them away from the treasure they want so much. If the mummy encounters one of the treasure hunters, he throws him in his dungeon. A game of bluff and a bit of memory. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.
